bill.title: Adoption Law; revise.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 93-17-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require A Court-ordered Or Voluntary Home Study Before Placement Or Adoption Of A Child; To Amend Section 93-17-6, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify The Father's Surrender Of Parental Rights To A Child Who Is Being Adopted; To Create New Section 93-17-18, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Attorney Training For Those Attorneys Representing The Parties To An Adoption; To Amend Section 93-17-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Documentation In The File Of Court And Other Costs; To Amend Section 93-17-205, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Permanent Retention Of Adoption Records And Documentation Of Compliance With Certain Adoption Requirements; To Amend Section 43-15-123, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Penalty For Noncompliance With Foster, Child-care And Child-placing Licensure Requirements; And For Related Purposes.
